oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Risālah fī iʻrāb lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lahu : manuscript, undated
Suʼāl wa-al-jawāb ʻan al-shahādatayn
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم وبه يفتى وهو حسبى الحمد لله الذي لا يقبل ذاته الجليلة الزوال ... :Incipit
...والحمد لله والاواخر والسكر له باطنا وظاهرا والصلاة على نبيه الذي بد الشرايع اقيمت والرسالة تمت. :Colophon
Written in one column, 23 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
Contains: 1. ʻUqūd al-durar fī-mā yuftá bihi min aqwāl al-Imām Zufar / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥamawī (f. 1r) ; 2. Risālah fī iʻrāb lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah (ff. 1v-10v).
MS Arab 160. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
